page.title: 19SPORTS RECREATION,CAUNTON
page.content: {SPORTS CLUBS IN CAUNTON {Caunton Cricket Club.}Caunton Cricket Club have won all the matches in the season 1985.In any month during the Cricket season they play between 4 and 5 matches.The club play most of their games on their home ground at Caunton.The Cricket Club win more matches than they lose.Recently they scored 134 runs againts another club. (County and England player Bruce French lives in Norwell Woodhouse.) { CAUNTON TENNIS CLUB. }On Wednesday people come from other villages to play tennis.Every week you play with someone different and all ages can play.On a Monday night there is a lady who comes to teach people how to play tennis.
